name: ROCK POOL PRIEST
description:
Lonely barnacle invents religion, bosses around fish. 

This was made for the Indie Tales jam, when i first had the idea i was like oh nice a barnacle in a rock pool is like the most one room thing out there and then i.. didnt rly emphasise that in the game, still i like what i made. Its very The Yawhg inspired but without the Yawhg. 

I also made the music, sorry

CONTROLS

space/enter to go through text/choose options

W/S or up/down to go between options

f for fullscreen esc to exit game
